scripts.image:docker:build:
run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v docker) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "docker build --ulimit nofile=5000:5000 $(echo $(build-env swfDevModeImage.buildTags) | xargs printf -- "-t $(build-env swfDevModeImageEnv.registry)/$(build-env swfDevModeImageEnv.account)/$(build-env swfDevModeImageEnv.name):%s
" | xargs echo) --build-arg KOGITO_IMAGE_TAG=$(build-env swfDevModeImage.kogitoImageTag) ." --else "echo Docker not found, skipping image build."
scripts.image:podman:build:
run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v podman) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "podman build --ulimit nofile=5000:5000 $(echo $(build-env swfDevModeImage.buildTags) | xargs printf -- "-t $(build-env swfDevModeImageEnv.registry)/$(build-env swfDevModeImageEnv.account)/$(build-env swfDevModeImageEnv.name):%s
" | xargs echo) --build-arg KOGITO_IMAGE_TAG=$(build-env swfDevModeImage.kogitoImageTag) -f Containerfile" --else "echo Podman not found, skipping image build."
